text:
e="preserve">Donald J. Salls (June 24, 1919 – January 3, 2021) was an American football player and coach. He was the head football coach at Jacksonville State University from 1946 to 1952 and from 1954 to 1964. He was a Purple Heart recipient. Salls was born in Trenton, New Jersey.
Salls died on January 3, 2021 at the age of 101.
